tool_description: Identifies and extracts the legal holding, ratio decidendi, and key legal principles established by court decisions.

case_citations.description: Array of case citations to analyze for legal holdings

holding_type.description: Type of holding to extract: narrow, broad, rule, principle

include_dicta.description: Whether to include obiter dicta analysis alongside holdings

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence score (0.5-1.0) for holding identification

error_messages: Invalid case citations: One or more citations cannot be located or accessed
Invalid holding type: Use one of [narrow, broad, rule, principle]
Invalid confidence threshold: Set value between 0.5 and 1.0
Too many cases: Limit holding analysis to 25 cases maximum per request
Insufficient case text: Cases lack sufficient detail for reliable holding extraction
usage: Provide case_citations array and optionally specify holding_type, include_dicta, and confidence_threshold. Returns identified holdings with confidence scores.

legal_holdings.description: Array of extracted legal holdings for each case

confidence_scores.description: Confidence scores (0-1) for each identified holding

obiter_dicta.description: Non-binding statements if include_dicta is true

legal_principles.description: Broader legal principles established or applied
